<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the faults which may emanate from Bupa Systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="InternalFault" type="tns:InternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ExternalFault" type="tns:ExternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ServiceUnavailableFault" type="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="InternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the InternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured within the Bupa system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details regarding the internal fault</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RetryIndicator" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds an indicator which described whether the fault may be rectified by retrying</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ExternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to incorrect supply of data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details of why the external fault occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Code" type="tns:ExternalFaultCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a value which indicates the category of external fault generated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ServiceUnavailableFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to system being temporarily out of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Information" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds information which is associated with service downtime and restoration expectations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExternalFaultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of external fault codes which indicate general reasons as to why a fault has occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MemberNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provided BI was not found in the DB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="EntityNotAssociatedWithMember"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The given entity (e.g. address/document/contact) was not associated with the member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="EntityNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested entity (e.g. address/document/contact) was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DatesOverlap"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">In case of adding/updating an entity that has the ValidFrom and ValidTo dates conflicting with an existing address validity interval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="InsufficientDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Insufficient data has been supplied to execute the request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="IncompatibleDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Incompatible data was supplied in one or more fields or data supplied was not compatible with existing data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GeneralValidationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general validation error occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestedDataNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested data was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AuthorizationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The connecting client could not be authorized</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OperationNotImplemented"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested operation has not been implemented and is not supported</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general error occured which could not be classified</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UnsuccessfulLogon"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Entity (for example Member, Group, Broker, Provider) is no longer allowed to logon to the website</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaim_v2_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaim_v2_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaim_v2_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaim_v2_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaim_v2_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An individual claim is returned by the GetClaim method which takes a ClaimRequest and returns a ClaimResponse.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ClaimRequest" type="tns:ClaimRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ClaimResponse" type="tns:ClaimResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="ClaimRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for a claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the claim for which is requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version of the claim required.If not supplied, return the latest version of the claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClaimResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for a <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaimsInvoice="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the Claim definition</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Claim" type="tns:Claim" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfClaims" type="tns:ArrayOfClaims" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Claim"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">BI's unique identifier for the claim. When submitting claims, if a Bupa Identifier is not passed (is null or empty), then it is assumed that this is a new claim. When a claim is first created it has a version number of 0. Whenever an adjustment is made to that claim, a copy of the current version is taken, the version number on the copy is incremented and the relevant changes are applied to the data on the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerClaimReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The originating partner's reference for this claim. This value will be blank when returning claim information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaPreAuthReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifer for the pre-auth on which this claim is based.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="tns:ClaimStatus" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the claim - either Paid, In Progress or Rejected.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SuspendReason" type="tns:SuspendReason" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The reason for suspension. If the claim is not suspended this will be blank</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member against who this claim is made.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerMemberId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The originating partner's reference for the member against who this claim is made.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimReceivedDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the claim was received by the originator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total financial amount originally claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalPaidAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total amount actually paid against this claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the claim was made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Notes" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Any additional information about the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LastActionDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the date at which an action was last performed against the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MedicalRecordConsent" type="commonClaimsInvoice:ClaimMedicalRecordConsent" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the member gave medical consent for Bupa or Partner to receive a medical report from the treating doctor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LoggedDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date claim was logged in our system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Invoices" type="commonClaimsInvoice:ArrayOfClaimInvoices" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The collection of invoices that make up the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfClaims"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claim" type="tns:Claim" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ClaimStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of claim status codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common Provider type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Provider" type="tns:Provider" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfProvider" type="tns:ArrayOfProvider" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>When Bupa receive a provider record associated with a claim for the first time from a partner, the provider information supplied is stored and allocated a unique Bupa provider number. Subsequent claims may use the BupaProviderId or continue to use the partner's PartnerReference.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaProviderId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The partner's reference for this provider. This is not returned from Bupa.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the correspondence address of the provider.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Title" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The title of provider if individual.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The first name of provider if individual.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MiddleInitials" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The middle initials of provider if individual.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The last name of provider if individual.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfProvider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A collection of provider.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Provider" type="tns:Provider" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A provider type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimByPartnerId_v2_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimByPartnerId_v2_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimByPartnerId_v2_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimByPartnerId_v2_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimByPartnerId_v2_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An individual claim is returned by the GetClaimByPartnerId method which takes a ClaimByPartnerIdRequest and returns a ClaimByPartnerIdResponse</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ClaimByPartnerIDRequest" type="tns:ClaimByPartnerIDRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ClaimByPartnerIDResponse" type="tns:ClaimByPartnerIDResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="ClaimByPartnerIDRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for a claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerClaimId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Partner Unique identifier for the claim for which is requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version of the claim required. If not supplied, return the latest version of the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClaimByPartnerIDResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for a claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claim" type="commonClaim:Claim"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The claim corresponding to the requested parameters.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimMetadata_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimMetadata_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimMetadata_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimMetadata_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetClaimMetadata_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v2_0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">In order to reliably detect whether or not a claim should be synchronized, we need to compare the notification originator with the system that first created the claim. The orchestration component is based on the premise that only the system that first raised the claim can make any amendments to it.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ClaimMetadataRequest" type="tns:ClaimMetadataRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ClaimMetadataResponse" type="tns:ClaimMetadataResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="ClaimMetadataRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for metadata claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the claim for which claim information is requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version of the claim required.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClaimMetadataResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for metadata claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PremiumCurrency " type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The premium currency of the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SourceSystem " type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The system that has originated the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimNote_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimNote_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v3_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v3_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v3_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v3_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v3_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" xmlns:commonClaimSummary="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for member claims retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="MemberClaimsRequest" type="tns:MemberClaimsRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="MemberClaimsResponse" type="tns:MemberClaimsResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="MemberClaimsRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for claims related to a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member for whom the claims information is requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="EarliestClaimDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the start date for claims to be returned. Only claims submitted on or after this date will be returned in the response. If null is supplied this will imply that the start date should be taken as 24 months before the current date. EarliestClaimDate date cannot be after LatestClaimDate date if provided or Current Date if LatestClaimDate is Null. Must be Null if BupaClaimId is provided.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LatestClaimDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the end date for claims to be returned. Only claims submitted on or prior this date will be returned in the response. If null is supplied this will imply that the end date should be taken as the current date. LatestClaimDate date cannot be before EarliestClaimDate (or Current Date if EarliestClaimDate is Null) Must be Null if BupaClaimId is provided.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimStatus" type="commonClaim:ArrayOfClaimStatus" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides a collection of claim status types which will be used for the query. Only claims which have a status which is within the collection of supplied status types will be returned. Passing null implies that all claims, regardless of state should be returned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MemberClaimsResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for claims related to a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claims" type="commonClaimSummary:ArrayOfClaimSummary" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An array of claims associated with the member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimSummary_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Summary information about a claim record</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ClaimSummary" type="tns:ClaimSummary" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfClaimSummary" type="tns:ArrayOfClaimSummary" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="ClaimSummary"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">BI's unique identifier for the claim. When submitting claims, if a Bupa Identifier is not passed (is null or empty), then it is assumed that this is a new claim. If a Bupa Identifier is supplied then it is assumed that a new version of the claim is being created</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version number of the claim. When a claim is first created it has a version number of 0. Whenever an adjustment is made to that claim, a copy of the current version is taken, the version number on the copy is incremented and the relevant changes are applied to the data on the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="commonClaim:ClaimStatus" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the claim - either Paid, In Progress or Rejected.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total financial amount originally claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalPaidAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total amount actually paid against this claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the claim was made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LastActionDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the date at which an action was last performed against the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LoggedDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date claim was logged in our system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentStartDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The earliest treatment start date against the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaidTo" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Payee name for who was paid.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfClaimSummary"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ClaimSummaries" type="tns:ClaimSummary" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

Allowable values are Correspondence, Residency or ClaimPayment only.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MemberTelephoneNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The telephone number to contact this member on regarding the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MemberEmailAddress" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The email address to contact this member on <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.MedicalConsentChoice_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.MedicalConsentChoice_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.MedicalConsentChoice_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.MedicalConsentChoice_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.MedicalConsentChoice_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the medical consent choices</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType name="MedicalConsentChoice"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of medical consent choices.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Arrays_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Arrays_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for creating unadjudicated <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaim_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimLine_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaim_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaim_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaim_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaimsInvoiceLine="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" xmlns:commonClaimsInvoice="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the Claim definition</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="UnadjudicatedClaim" type="tns:UnadjudicatedClaim" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfUnadjudicatedClaims" type="tns:ArrayOfUnadjudicatedClaims" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="UnadjudicatedClaim"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the claim. Not to be provided for a new claim. If provided then this is an adjustment to an existing claim (note cliam version number is not part of this type as only the latest version of a claim can be adjusted)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ProviderClaimReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The billing provider's reference for this claim. Must be unique across all this provider’s claims. Must be supplied for a new claim. Can be provided for adjustments (the providers reference for this version of the claim).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InvoiceDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the claim was raised.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaProviderId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa’s Id for the provider who raised this invoice (actually the Id of the provider in the backend system this claim is being stored in)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaPreAuthReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifer for the pre-auth on which this claim is based.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member against who this claim is made.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberGivenName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">First / given name of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberFamilyName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Last / family name of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberDoB" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Date of birth of member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentCountryCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the country the treatment occurred in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total financial amount claimed. Must be equal to the sum of the ClaimedAmount fields on each UnadjudicatedClaimInvoice for this claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiscountApplied" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Discount amount applied to the claim by provider. This amount is subtracted from TotalClaimedAmount to give the total amount to be paid by Bupa.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimCurrencyCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the claim was made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentCurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the claim should be paid in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PayeeType" type="commonClaimsInvoice:ClaimPayeeType" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">What type of payee received payment (e.g. MainMember, Provider, Group)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdmissionDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The planned admission date for the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DischargeDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The planned discharge date for the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryDiagnosis" type="commonDiagnosis:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary diagnosis of the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiagnosisDescription" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the member’s primary condition/disease.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Notes" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Any additional information about the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MemberPay" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Amount member has alreay paid/will pay against the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InvoiceLines" type="commonClaimsInvoiceLine:ArrayOfUnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLines" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The collection of invoice lines that make up this claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfUnadjudicatedClaims"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claim" type="tns:UnadjudicatedClaim" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0" xmlns:commonClaimsProcedure="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimProcedure_v1_0" xmlns:commonProvider="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" xmlns:commonTreatment="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.TreatmentType_v1_0" xmlns:commonDiscountReason="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.DiscountSavingReason_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimProcedure_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimProcedure_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v3_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.TreatmentType_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.TreatmentType_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.DiscountSavingReason_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.DiscountSavingReason_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LineId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provider's reference for this item. Must be unique for the UnadjudicatedClaim that this line belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentFromDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The first date of the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentToDate" type="xs:dateTime" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The last date of the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="NumberOfIncidents" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The number of treatment incidents being invoiced for.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount claimed on this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiscountSavingAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount not to be paid against this line</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DiscountSavingReason" type="commonDiscountReason:DiscountSavingReason" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the rejection reason associated with this line. Mandatory if DiscountSavingAmount is supplied.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryProcedure" type="commonClaimsProcedure:ClaimProcedure" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary procedure carried out on this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ProcedureDescription" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the procedure carried out on this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentType" type="commonTreatment:TreatmentType" minOccurs="1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">In-patient, Day Case or Out-patient</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LineNotes" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Any additional information about the invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfUnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLines"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="InvoiceLine" type="tns:UnadjudicatedClaimInvoiceLine" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
